title: Game will go black
body: So i can select a champ but on the loading screen it will completely stop and i have to alt tab out and in for it to load but when it does it goes black and i can here it playing but cant play because of black screen.

replies.body: Being able to hear the game but not see anything might be due to a driver or hardware failure.  It can't render the game properly even though you are connected.  Go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and update your drivers.  It's important to go over every step!
